resources.string:
Ability: Kill someone each night.

Attributes:
-You can\'t be killed at night.
-If there is a Mafioso, he will attack the target instead of you.
-You will appear to be a town member to the Sheriff.
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

Goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

Special Attribute: Unique Role, Detection Immunity, Night Immunity

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is a leader among men. They must be the Mayor or the Godfather.
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Win with Mafia
Win with Witchs
Win with Survivors

Ability: Vote on someone to kill at night.

Attributes:
-You will carry out the Godfather\'s orders.
-If Godfather is dead or did not choose to kill someone you kill whoever you want.
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

Goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

Special Attributes: Unique Role

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target is good with documents. They must be a Framer
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Win with Mafia
Win with Witchs
Win with Survivors
